This translation was made by a fan of this comic. Nobody made any money out of it. It's the work of an aficionado, without much knowledge of graphic design, and does not intend to be a substitute for the original work. I just want to fill the hole that the author leaves not offering translations of his work into other languages than English. It's not an official release of The Order of the Stick comic.
